criteria.name: id
criteria.explanation: Returns A Member whose unique identifier in the system is 12345.
criteria.equals: Members' Name system unique identifier.

criteria.name: refDods
criteria.explanation: Returns A Member whose reference in the Dods system is 12345.
criteria.equals: Lookup on a Members Dods reference number.

criteria.name: gender
criteria.explanation: Male Members.
criteria.equals: A Members' gender (M or F).

criteria.name: namesw
criteria.explanation: Members whose surname starts with the letter A (Commons Members only will be returned unless a House parameter is also included in the query).
criteria.equals: Members' name (by default Commons Members) starts with the characters supplied.

criteria.name: titlesw
criteria.explanation: Members whose title starts with the letter A.
criteria.equals: Members' title (i.e. Members of the House of Lords) starts with the characters supplied.

criteria.name: name
criteria.asterisk: Searches for preferred names (Commons Members) containing the value specified.
criteria.explanation: Members whose preferred name is David Smith, or in the asterisk example, contains the word Smith (e.g. Smithson - Commons Members only will be returned unless a House parameter is also included in the query).
criteria.equals: A Members' full preferred name.

criteria.name: title
criteria.asterisk: Searches for titles containing the value specified.
criteria.explanation: Members whose title is Lord Black of London, or in the asterisk example, contains the word Black (e.g. Blackburn).
criteria.equals: A Members' title (how a member is addressed, used instead of name in the House of Lords).

criteria.name: nametitle
criteria.explanation: Members with the salutatory title Mrs.
criteria.equals: A Members' salutatory title (Mr/Mrs etc... Commons Members only).

criteria.name: forename
criteria.asterisk: Includes all forenames A Member has been known by historically.
criteria.explanation: Members whose current forename is David, or in the asterisk example, has ever been called David.
criteria.equals: A Members' current forename.

criteria.name: surname
criteria.asterisk: Includes all surnames A Member has been known by historically.
criteria.explanation: Members whose current surname is Smith, or in the asterisk example, has ever been called Smith.
criteria.equals: A Members' current surname.

criteria.name: rank
criteria.asterisk: Includes all ranks A Member has held.
criteria.explanation: Members whose current rank is Lord, or in the asterisk example, has ever held the rank Lord.
criteria.equals: A Members' current rank (e.g Lord, Viscount).

criteria.name: honprefix
criteria.asterisk: Includes all honourary prefixes A Member has held historically.
criteria.explanation: Members who are currently Right Honourable, or in the asterisk example, have ever been Right Honourable.
criteria.equals: A Members' current honourary prefixes.

criteria.name: biographycategory
criteria.explanation: Members with one or more interests in the biography category Foreign Affairs.
criteria.equals: Members having one or more biographical interests in the specified category.

criteria.name: biographyinterest
criteria.explanation: Members with an interest in Africa.
criteria.equals: Members with the specified interest.

criteria.name: experiencetype
criteria.explanation: Members with experience in one or more areas of Non Political areas.
criteria.equals: Members having experience one in the specified area.

criteria.name: experience
criteria.explanation: Members who have been a company director.
criteria.equals: Members with the specified experience.

criteria.name: honour
criteria.asterisk: Members who have held the honour now or in the past.
criteria.explanation: Members with a KBE, or current and previous holders of the honour.
criteria.equals: Members holding the specified honour.

criteria.name: living
criteria.explanation: Members who are now deceased.
criteria.equals: Whether a Member is alive or not.

criteria.name: interestcategory
criteria.explanation: Members with one or more interests in the interest category with the id of 1.
criteria.equals: Members having one or more registered interests in the specified category.

criteria.name: house
criteria.asterisk: Includes previous House Memberships.
criteria.explanation: Members who currently sit in the Commons, or in the asterisk example, have ever sat in the Commons.
criteria.equals: The House a Member currently sits in.

criteria.name: fymp
criteria.explanation: Members with a constituency in the postcode AA1 1AB
criteria.equals: Postcode lookup for a Members' constituency.

criteria.name: party
criteria.asterisk: Includes previous party allegiances.
criteria.explanation: Members who are currently aligned to the Conservative party, or in the asterisk example, have had allegience to the party in the past.
criteria.equals: The party a Member currently has allegiance with.

criteria.name: partysubtype
criteria.asterisk: Includes previous party sub-type allegiances.
criteria.explanation: Members who are currently aligned to the Coop party sub type, or in the asterisk example, have had allegience to the party sub type in the past.
criteria.equals: The party sub-type a Member currently has allegiance to.

criteria.name: constituency
criteria.asterisk: Includes Members who previously represented a constituency.
criteria.explanation: Member who currently represents Eltham, or in the asterisk example, have represented Eltham in the past.
criteria.equals: The constituency a Member represents.

criteria.name: constituencyinarea
criteria.asterisk: Includes Members who represented the area in the past.
criteria.explanation: Members who are currently represent an English constituency, or in the asterisk example, have done so in the past.
criteria.equals: Members representing constituencies in a given area.

criteria.name: returnedatelection
criteria.explanation: Members returned at the 2010 General Election.
criteria.equals: Members returned at the specified election.

criteria.name: lordsmembershiptype
criteria.asterisk: Includes Members who have sat by that type of membership in the past.
criteria.explanation: Members who currently sit as elected members of the House of Lords, or in the asterisk example, have done so in the past.
criteria.equals: Lords Members of the specified type (e.g. Elected).

criteria.name: iseligible
criteria.explanation: Members eligible to sit
criteria.equals: Whether a Member is currently eligible to sit in either House.

criteria.name: currentstatus
criteria.explanation: Members currently suspended for any reason.
criteria.equals: Members with the specified current status.

criteria.name: standingdown
criteria.explanation: Members standing down at the next election.
criteria.equals: Whether a Member is standing down at the next election.

criteria.name: holdsgovernmentpost
criteria.asterisk: Members who have held a Government post now or in the past.
criteria.explanation: Current Government post holders.
criteria.equals: Members holding a Government post.

criteria.name: holdsoppositionpost
criteria.asterisk: Members who have held an Opposition post now or in the past.
criteria.explanation: Current Opposition post holders.
criteria.equals: Members holding an Opposition post.

criteria.name: holdsparliamentarypost
criteria.asterisk: Members who have held a Parliamentary/Party post now or in the past.
criteria.explanation: Current Parliamentary/Party post holders.
criteria.equals: Members holding a Parliamentary/Party post.

criteria.name: governmentpost
criteria.asterisk: Members who have held the specified Government post now or in the past.
criteria.explanation: Current Chancellor of the Exchequer, or in the asterisk example, the current and previous holders of the post. NB. It is advised to use the id option for this criterion so as to avoid typographical errors.
criteria.equals: Members holding the specified Government post.

criteria.name: oppositionpost
criteria.asterisk: Members who have held the specified Opposition post now or in the past.
criteria.explanation: Current Shadow Chancellor of the Exchequer, or in the asterisk example, the current and previous holders of the post. NB. It is advised to use the id option for this criterion so as to avoid typographical errors.
criteria.equals: Members holding the specified Opposition post.

criteria.name: parliamentarypost
criteria.asterisk: Members who have held the specified Parliamentary post now or in the past.
criteria.explanation: Current Speaker, or in the asterisk example, the current and previous holders of the post. NB. It is advised to use the id option for this criterion so as to avoid typographical errors.
criteria.equals: Members holding the specified Parliamentary post.

criteria.name: holdscabinetpost
criteria.asterisk: Members who have held a cabinet post now or in the past.
criteria.explanation: Current cabinet post holders.
criteria.equals: Members holding a cabinet post.

criteria.name: holdsshadowcabinetpost
criteria.asterisk: Members who have held a shadow cabinet post now or in the past.
criteria.explanation: Current shadow cabinet post holders.
criteria.equals: Members holding a shadow cabinet post.

criteria.name: committee
criteria.asterisk: Members who have sat on the Committee now or in the past.
criteria.explanation: Current members of the Administration Committee, or, current and previous members of the committee.
criteria.equals: Members sitting on the specified Committee.

criteria.name: deceaseddays
criteria.explanation: Current or former Members who have died in the past 90 days. The membership=all parameter here will include former Members who have died, otherwise only Members who held a membership at time of death will be returned.
criteria.equals: Members who have died in the number of days specified.

criteria.name: retireddays
criteria.explanation: Members who have died in the past 90 days.
criteria.equals: Members who have retired in the number of days specified.

criteria.name: joineddays
criteria.explanation: Members who have joined either house in the past 90 days.
criteria.equals: Members who have joined a house in the number of days specified.

criteria.name: oath
criteria.explanation: Members who have taken an oath in the past 90 days.
criteria.equals: Members who have taken an oath in the number of days specified.

criteria.name: maidenspeechdays
criteria.explanation: Members who have made their maiden speech in the past 90 days.
criteria.equals: Members who have made their maiden speech in the number of days specified.

criteria.name: deceasedsince
criteria.explanation: Current or former Members who have died since 1st January 2012. The membership=all parameter here will include former Members who have died, otherwise only Members who held a membership at time of death will be returned.
criteria.equals: Members who have died since the date specified (YYYY-MM-DD format).

criteria.name: retiredsince
criteria.explanation: Members who have died since 1st January 2012.
criteria.equals: Members who have retired since the date specified (YYYY-MM-DD format).

criteria.name: joinedsince
criteria.explanation: Members who have joined either house since 1st January 2012.
criteria.equals: Members who have joined a house since the date specified (YYYY-MM-DD format).

criteria.name: oath
criteria.explanation: Members who have taken an oath since 1st January 2012.
criteria.equals: Members who have taken an oath since the date specified (YYYY-MM-DD format).

criteria.name: maidenspeechsince
criteria.asterisk: Not supported
criteria.explanation: Members who have made their maiden speech since 1st January 2012
criteria.equals: Members who have made their maiden speech since the date specified (YYYY-MM-DD format)

criteria.name: deceasedbetween
criteria.explanation: Current or former Members who have died between 1st January 2012 and 31st March 2012. The membership=all parameter here will include former Members who have died, otherwise only Members who held a membership at time of death will be returned.
criteria.equals: Members who have died between the dates specifed (pass in the format YYYY-MM-DDandYYYY-MM-DD).

criteria.name: retiredbetween
criteria.explanation: Members who have died between 1st January 2012 and 31st March 2012.
criteria.equals: Members who have retired between the dates specifed (pass in the format YYYY-MM-DDandYYYY-MM-DD).

criteria.name: joinedbetween
criteria.explanation: Members who have joined either house between 1st January 2012 and 31st March 2012.
criteria.equals: Members who have joined a house between the dates specifed (pass in the format YYYY-MM-DDandYYYY-MM-DD).

criteria.name: oath
criteria.explanation: Members who have taken an oath between 1st January 2012 and 31st March 2012.
criteria.equals: Members who have taken an oath between the dates specifed (pass in the format YYYY-MM-DDandYYYY-MM-DD).

criteria.name: maidenspeechbetween
criteria.explanation: Members who have made their maiden speech between 1st January 2012 and 31st March 2012.
criteria.equals: Members who have made their maiden speech between the dates specifed (pass in the format YYYY-MM-DDandYYYY-MM-DD).

criteria.name: lordsmemberbetween
criteria.explanation: Members who were Lords members between 1st January 2012 and 31st March 2012.
criteria.equals: Members who held a membership in the House of Lords between the dates specifed (pass in the format YYYY-MM-DDandYYYY-MM-DD).

criteria.name: commonsmemberbetween
criteria.explanation: Members who were Commons members between 1st January 2012 and 31st March 2012.
criteria.equals: Members who held a membership in the House of Commons between the dates specifed (pass in the format YYYY-MM-DDandYYYY-MM-DD).

criteria.name: heldcabinetpostbetween
criteria.explanation: Members who were in the cabinet between 1st January 2012 and 31st March 2012.
criteria.equals: Members who held a cabinet post between the dates specifed (pass in the format YYYY-MM-DDandYYYY-MM-DD).

criteria.name: heldshadowcabinetpostbetween
criteria.explanation: Members who were in the shadow cabinet between 1st January 2012 and 31st March 2012.
criteria.equals: Members who held a shadow cabinet post between the dates specifed (pass in the format YYYY-MM-DDandYYYY-MM-DD).

outputs.name: FullBiog
outputs.description:
Returns all data held about a Member. This will only be permitted on queries that return five records or fewer.
                All other output types return subsets of this data.

outputs.name: Addresses
outputs.description: Member address information (e.g. website, twitter, consituency address etc...)

outputs.name: BasicDetails
outputs.description: Basic information about the Member (e.g. given name, HoL membership type, oaths etc...).

outputs.name: BiographyEntries
outputs.description: Member biographical information (e.g. countries of interest, policy expertise etc...).

outputs.name: Committees
outputs.description: Committees a Member sits or has sat on as well details on committee chairing.

outputs.name: Constituencies
outputs.description: Constituencies a Member has represented.

outputs.name: ElectionsContested
outputs.description: Elections a Member has contested but not won.

outputs.name: Experiences
outputs.description: Non-parliamentary experience of a Member.

outputs.name: GovernmentPosts
outputs.description: Government posts a Member has held.

outputs.name: Honours
outputs.description: Honours (e.g. MBE, OBE etc...) held by a Member.

outputs.name: HouseMemberships
outputs.description: House membership list of a Member.

outputs.name: Interests
outputs.description: Registered interests (financial) of a Member.

outputs.name: KnownAs
outputs.description: Details of names a Member has chosen to be known as instead of their full title (HoL members only).

outputs.name: MaidenSpeeches
outputs.description: Maiden speech dates for a Member.

outputs.name: OppositionPosts
outputs.description: Opposition posts a Member has held.

outputs.name: OtherParliaments
outputs.description: Other Parliaments that a Member has held a membership of.

outputs.name: ParliamentaryPosts
outputs.description: Parliamentary posts a Member has held.

outputs.name: Parties
outputs.description: Party affiliations of a Member.

outputs.name: PreferredNames
outputs.description: Full set of data about a Members' name (e.g. surname, forename, Honorary prefixes, full details of HoL title and rank etc...)

outputs.name: Staff
outputs.description: Staff employed by a Member.

outputs.name: Statuses
outputs.description: Status history (e.g. suspensions and disqualifications) for a Member.
